name: Project Ark (itch) (BlackRoseMii)
description:
This game is made for the IGMC 2022

Plot:

When the earth was threatened by poisonous miasma and mutants and it seemed like the end is near, a project was started that was supposed to save humanity. A project in which a part of humanity was stored inside a computer - The Ark. 

Now several hundred years later, a group of psychics were woken up in order to check on how the world has become. And their mission was to judge if the earth was finally in a state in which it could become habitable again. 

However, it seemed like both the miasma and the mutants were still around.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Features:

- 2D sidescrolling

- Avoid dangers like the miasma and mutants in order to progress

- Completely hand-drawn maps and characters.

- A story that could act as a prologue to something bigger.
